This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Client hints not loaded on cross-origin iframe request with no feature policy.
FAIL Client hints loaded on same-origin iframe request with no feature policy. promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: "FAIL sec-ch-prefers-reduced-motion True None"
PASS Client hints loaded on cross-origin iframe request with allow list.
FAIL Client hints loaded on same-origin iframe request with allow list. promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: "FAIL sec-ch-prefers-reduced-motion True None"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
